description: We did this hike on snow shoes in the winter, which is why it was an all-day hike.  In the summer there is an established trail.  Great views.
directions: Hike is actually in California, but it's just over the border from Reno.  Take the Big Bend off of I-80.  There is  marked trail head parking lot on the south side of the highway.
title: Loch Leven Lakes
